group_1.textRight: You seem to have people prying into your@affairs. Is everything okay?

group_1.textLeft: You're such a worrywart, Kanagi.
It's no big deal if they find out about @where I go to school or where I'm from.

group_1.textRight: But if your cover is blown, you'll have to@deal with some unwanted customers.
That may cause you some trouble.

group_1.textLeft: There are barely any Magical Girls in Daito@at the moment.
I wouldn't worry about a crowd rushing in.
I doubt they'll come all the way here to@bother us at school.

group_1.textRight: All right, I won't say any more if you@think it's fine.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, there's nothing to worry about.
Anyway, you came here to enhance your@magic?

group_1.textRight: Yes, but also to help you practice.
I assume you can fight with your own magic@now?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes, that's right!
I've finally figured out how to apply it@for other uses.
It's all thanks to your help.

group_1.textRight: I see, but there's no need to thank me.
We've known each other for so long,@after all.

group_1.textLeft: It makes me happy to hear you say that.
But I think it will be dangerous to for you@to work with me on this from now on.
My magic is similar to a curse, though it@hasn't worked on Witches until now.
But I'm able to tamper with people's magic,@so I've been developing that skill.
Anyway, I decided to utilize that power!

group_1.textRight: You're saying tampering with Magical Girls'@powers can be repurposed as an attack?

group_1.textLeft: Exactly.
To put it simply, I have to deliberately fail@my usual procedure.
When I attack I penetrate my magic into the@enemy and destroy them from inside.
Well, more or less.

group_1.textRight: I see. In that case, all that's left is a@test run.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed.
What is it?

group_1.textRight: You truly are an extraordinary Magical Girl,@Mitama.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, that's not true.
I'm just a normal girl.

group_1.narration: I'm Mitama Yakumo, a young student of@Daito Academy. My attendance is barely@acceptable, but my test results are always@perfect. That's the kind of person I am.
